body:
i’m thankful that miso was more affectionate to me today than she usually is. 

i’m thankful for the spotify end of year playlists, the top 100 and tastebreakers, which, if you think about the ways that listening to music is like a drug, has such effects on cognition and focus and emotion and the rhythms of the body, is like spotify saying merry christmas, i have two gifts for you, one is a box of your favorite drugs, and one is a box of drugs you’ve never tried but that i think you’ll like.

i’m thankful for the original of this song that i thought was a yo la tengo original (

[https://open.spotify.com/track/1umKrwGtLeRLd9InuebzP0?si=biqbMNxOSES61\_lWP4gwCg](https://open.spotify.com/track/1umKrwGtLeRLd9InuebzP0?si=biqbMNxOSES61_lWP4gwCg)). i’m thankful for the origin of the beginning of “ghost town” which is such a glimpse (

[https://open.spotify.com/track/1CA90cZ19qHb7cFCrHbRl2?si=PgI0rokiQN-oyKqcVcjvjQ](https://open.spotify.com/track/1CA90cZ19qHb7cFCrHbRl2?si=PgI0rokiQN-oyKqcVcjvjQ)

). i’m thankful for this floaty loop (

[https://open.spotify.com/track/4HXShgD3c3dq65CtAqoqzh?si=O-coQ7hDTH-zkRVFTJwGbQ](https://open.spotify.com/track/4HXShgD3c3dq65CtAqoqzh?si=O-coQ7hDTH-zkRVFTJwGbQ)). i’m thankful for the throb of this (

[https://open.spotify.com/track/5rC2TX3Qi37o3OwCBAEYNt?si=9FpOWO61RnqR9tN837B2jw](https://open.spotify.com/track/5rC2TX3Qi37o3OwCBAEYNt?si=9FpOWO61RnqR9tN837B2jw)). i’m thankful for the blown out synth in this new mariah song (

[https://open.spotify.com/track/5xpX9WrjPZyFkmaKonnzlT?si=OXjJtGEZTM-IvW27te7IQA](https://open.spotify.com/track/5xpX9WrjPZyFkmaKonnzlT?si=OXjJtGEZTM-IvW27te7IQA)).

i’m thankful for bluetooth. i’m thankful for the “stress relief” preset of the mindwave iphone app on over ear headphones with my eyes closed, which feels like being inside a carwash as a child.

i’m thankful for the experience of getting into bed in the winter, which i know some people don’t like, the crispness of the sheets against the skin, but feels to me like such a celebration of having a body, stretching out under them and going horizontal, goosepimpling.
